definitions.definition: Deceptive or false appearance; that which misleads the eye or the mind.
An argument , or apparent argument, which professes to be decisive of the matter at issue, while in reality it is not; a specious argument.

main_definition: Deceptive or false appearance; that which misleads the eye or the mind.
secondary_definitions: ( logic ) An argument , or apparent argument, which professes to be decisive of the matter at issue, while in reality it is not; a specious argument.
